title: ISurfaceKnitFeatureData.IGetEntities
description: Gets the knitted faces and surfaces for this Surface-Knit feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of knit entities ( faces and surfaces ) of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISurfaceKnitFeatureData::GetEntitiesCount
before calling this method.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
